description: Create now has tiers that mirror GregTech tiers. This means:
/d/"Stress Tiers"/d/ use the same values as GregTech /d/Voltage Tiers/d/. LV: 32 volts. LS: 32 stress units.
Shafts have an SU limit and SU consumption, similar to GregTech wires. Shafts made of different materials have different SU limits and SU consumption.
Other Tiered Blocks now have an SU limit, meaning once the amount of /d/stress generated/d/ on a line is /c/exceeded/c/, machines will stop until rectified. (Similar to how overcapacity works)
Recipes in Create machines have /d/minimum SU requirements/d/ based on tier, which can be viewed in JEI.
